articles.description: The firm already started working on it but given the protests and circumstances, Chrome developers want to change all the possible user-facing instances of ‘blacklist’ and ‘whitelist’ in Chrome.
articles.content: It's no secret that the world is not just going through Covid-19 pandemic but also through Black Lives Matter protests, fighting the idea of racism in every way possible. Google has already shown its… [+1472 chars]
